<<<<<<< HEAD
A pill to purge out poperie: or, A catechisme for Romish Catholikes shewing that popery is contrarie to the grounds of the Catholike religion, and that therefore papists cannot be good Catholikes. Mico, John.
[2], 45, [1] p.
Printed for Beniamin Fisher: and are to be sold at his shop in Pater-noster Row at the signe of the Talbot, London : 1623.
By John Mico. Running title reads: A pill to purge out popery. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery. Tightly bound.
=======
